name: Man-at-Arms Targetting Grid
desc:
Standard-issue targeting system installed on Federal Navy ships. The Mark 19 Man-at-Arms Targeting Grid links with the ship's onboard sensors and synchronizes them to generate accurate target-tracking.

- Increases the range of small, medium, and large mounts by %s/%s/%s

- Increases the target lead and range of small ballistic PD turrets by %s
short: Standard-issue Krysan targetting system Increases ballistic weapon range by %s/%s/%s and PD range by %s.

name: Black Rat Stealth Composites
desc: Utilizing an extensive suite of multispectral stealth composites, heatsinks, and signature masking, this craft is able to reduce its sensor profile sensor profile by %s.
short: Stealthy rat. Decreases sensor profile by %s.
